message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $15,000.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer!  $15,000 is a bit more than I'm comfortable spending right now. I'd be happy to pay $11,000 for it. What do you think?
I understand you're looking to save some money, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I still need to make a profit. I can offer it to you for $13,500.
Alice, I appreciate you meeting me halfway, but $13,500 is still a bit more than I'm looking to spend. How about $12,500? That would be a fair price for both of us.

I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer it to you for $13,000, which is my lowest price. After that, I'll have to consider other options.
